Name: BrainTeaser
About the game: BrainTeaser is an arcade scoring puzzle. You need to rotate the circles so that the projectiles flying into them hit the desired color. The game provides several levels of difficulty, each with a new color compartment on each of the circles. Over time, the pace of the game accelerates and you will have to try not to lose.
